Counter-Strike: Source is a complete remake of Counter-Strike using the Source Game Engine. As in the original, Counter-Strike: Source pits a team of counter-terrorists against a team of terrorists in a series of rounds. Each round is won either by completing an objective (such as detonating a bomb or rescuing hostages) or by eliminating all members of the enemy team.
10/10 - would choose over a life or wife again

Well here is something I must say about the game right away. This game is just the remake of the old CS 1.6 but in source. But just because Valve remakes an IP that does not mean that it is a bad game in fact it is quite good although the game is quite abandoned due to the CSGO comunity. This game has most of the content NEEDED to play and enjoy GMOD though so I do recomend it for that. Also THIS GAME HAS NO R8 REVOLVER YAAAASSSSS anyways I suggest this game if you want to upgrade the graphics of CS 1.6 so yeah. My final rating for this game is an 8/10.

Не смотря на год выхода, игра является одной из лучших. Она конечно не смогла стать такой же культовой как cs 1.6 , но все же в ней есть некая изюминка, по причине которой, в нее играет довольно большое количество игроков.

HEY BRo do u wanna SLOTHER some evil Bad Guy arabians? well BOY OH BOY do I have the Video game for you, i have not masterbated in YEARS and i can STILL tell you with complete consequence that COUNTER STRIKED GLOBAL OSTENSIVE will give you a Very Good BANG (Get It Like With A Glock 9) for ur Hard Earned Buck.

One of the most epic shooter of all times, my favorite CS because it's the most "open", the most different, the most varied of all CS, not the most competitive since GO came out to take the place of 1.6 but CSS "was" (kinda dead today in 2k15) surely the most lovely and funny CS. 
You could play FFA to stay in the mind of CS, a few minutes later you could be in a jail listening to kids telling you what you must do, you could be on the epics Simpsons, South Park, Sponge Bob maps playing GunGame (it's my favorite mode, half of my playtime is on this mode, this is what makes me start CS), or Surfing on some giants maps, playing with 50 others people on a Zombie server, play as a minimal person on a kitchen in the Rats servers, or the famous AWP, Deagle, 1v1, Scout, Bhop servers ...
Yeh, although I love GO for being the best Online FPS today, I miss so damn hard CSS, it always be in my mind for being a game that gaves me desires to play a lot, I miss so hard the "Golden Age" of this game that created the best community (in good and bad) of all the games I played.

There was a time when PC gaming was not as accesible as having a rig of your own, during that time I would save up what little change I had for weeks. Eventually, I would have enough to pay for some play time at the local video store which had a LAN setup of like 10 computers. 

I remember Counter Strike and Source to be the greatest multiplayer games every created. Ignore the small amount of hours recorded on this Steam account. I played hundreds, possibly thousands of hours with my best friend in that video store. Didn't even realize all the times we went there, we could have saved up to buy our own PC's....but we were hooked. It was like a drug...the best one.

Anyways, the MOD's from the community are absolutely incredible and keep the game as fun as possible. I still prefer this over Global Offensive....but maybe that's just me.

BUY IT NOW. SUPPORT VOLVO.
ALL HAIL GABEN
amazin game, base of the best fps on the steam store.
Игра была интересной до обновления движка , теперь уже так себе!

dal 1998 io gioco a CS ed ho amato questo titolo fin dai suoi esordi con tutti i difetti, il lag spropositato e gli aggiornamenti decennali. E' un gioco che suggerisco per chi non ha tempo o modo di dedicarsi ad altro, ottimo come aiuto per sparire un pò dal trambusto della vita reale, eccezionale nella sua semplicità.
pecca un pò di controllo per i cheat, ma da sempre è una pecca di qualsiasi gioco online o no ? 
Molto andrebbe fatto per insegnare educazione e netiquette ai suoi usufruitori ma è anche uno dei suoi punti di forza, la varietà di interazioni.
consiglierei questo gioco a chiunque!
la versione Source è ormai obsoleta se messa a paragone con la versione Global Offensive ma pur sempre ottima per avvicinarsi al genere.

Since 1998 I play CS and I loved this title since its inception with all faults, and the lag disproportionate updates decades. It 'a game that I recommend for those who have no time or opportunity to spend on other things, an excellent aid to disappear a little bit from the bustle of real life, outstanding in its simplicity.
flaw a bit of control to cheat, but has always been a flaw of any online game or not?
Much should be done to teach manners and etiquette to his usufruitori but is also one of its strengths, the variety of interactions.
I would recommend this game to anyone!
Source version is obsolete when put in comparison with the version Global Offensive but still good to get close to the genre.
I love CS 1.6, CS:S, CS:CZ, and somelove CS:GO!!! :)
One of the more unrefined Counter Strike games, but boy does the custom map community make this game worth it!
